name: Trolls in Space
description:
This is my first prototype game - Trolls in Space

Trolls have breached the international space station and your goal is to survive the horde of enemies trying to kill you and the longer you survive, the more points you get!

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement

SPACE - Jump

Left Mouse Button / O - Shoot 

Right Mouse Button / I - Melee

E - Speed Boost Ability

P - Pause Game

R - Restart game (works when you die)
